Name: installed
Description: true if this version of this extension is currently installed

Name: superuser
Description: true if only superusers are allowed to install this extension (but see trusted)

Name: trusted
Description: true if the extension can be installed by non-superusers with appropriate privileges

Name: relocatable
Description: true if extension can be relocated to another schema

Name: schema
Description: name of the schema that the extension must be installed into, or null if partially or fully relocatable

Name: requires
Description: names of prerequisite extensions, or null if none

Name: comment
Description: comment string from the extension's control file
